name: P_BMM_CLASS
documentation: Definition of persistent form of `BMM_CLASS` for serialisation to ODIN, JSON, XML etc.

name.name: name
name.documentation: Name of the class. Persisted attribute.

ancestors.name: ancestors
ancestors.documentation: List of immediate inheritance parents. If there are generic ancestors, use `_ancestor_defs_` instead. Persisted attribute.

properties.name: properties
properties.documentation: List of attributes defined in this class. Persistent attribute.

is_abstract.name: is_abstract
is_abstract.documentation: True if this is an abstract type. Persisted attribute.

is_override.name: is_override
is_override.documentation: True if this class definition overrides one found in an included schema.

generic_parameter_defs.name: generic_parameter_defs
generic_parameter_defs.documentation: List of generic parameter definitions. Persisted attribute.

source_schema_id.name: source_schema_id
source_schema_id.documentation: Reference to original source schema defining this class. Set during `BMM_SCHEMA` materialise. Useful for GUI tools to enable user to edit the schema file containing a given class (i.e. taking into account that a class may be in any of the schemas in a schema inclusion hierarchy).

uid.name: uid
uid.documentation: Unique id generated for later comparison during merging, in order to detect if two classes are the same. Assigned in post-load processing.

ancestor_defs.name: ancestor_defs
ancestor_defs.documentation: List of structured inheritance ancestors, used only in the case of generic inheritance. Persisted attribute.

is_generic.name: is_generic
is_generic.documentation: True if this class is a generic class.

populate_bmm_class.name: populate_bmm_class
populate_bmm_class.documentation: Add remaining model elements from Current to `_bmm_class_definition_`.
